_header: Were that that is I-do yet for to doon
Subjects: lechery; sermons, verse in; women, as speakers/narrators
_description: An act beyond recall — one quatrain

DurCathBI18.Transcription: Were þat his donfor to done…

Sisam,  Celia,  and  Kenneth Sisam, eds.
